description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

description.ru:
Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED ASTRAY

description.en: A side story manga set in the Cosmic Era timeline that takes place concurrently with *Mobile Suit Gundam SEED*. It is one part of the first wave of the *SEED Astray* multimedia project. Whereas the main story of *Gundam SEED* focuses on the struggles between the Earth Alliance, ZAFT, and Orb Union, the Astray series is focused on the three MBF-P mobile suit prototypes and their respective pilots and organizations, who mainly exist on the outskirts of the main SEED storyline. The MBF-P02 Gundam Astray Red Frame is piloted by Lowe Guele of the Junk Guild, and the MBF-P03 Gundam Astray Blue Frame is piloted by Murakumo Gai of the mercenary group Serpent Tail. The third Astray, MBF-P01 Gundam Astray Gold Frame, is piloted by the primary antagonist of the Astray story, Orb nobleman Rondo Gina Sahaku, and later by his twin sister Rondo Mina Sahaku. [Via Gundam Wiki]---The Re:Master edition includes ASTRAY and X ASTRAY with the extra chapters moved to different spots.

altTitles.ja: 最上の命医

description.en:
Saijou Mikoto was born with a bad heart. It was thanks to the incredible skills of Japanese leading pediatric heart surgeon, Shindou Mamoru, that he survived into adolescence, and he's decided to show his gratitude by becoming the greatest pediatric surgeon the world has ever known.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The Best Skilled Surgeon** (2008)

In this world, there is: Confucianism; Taoism; Buddhism, Demons, and Magicians. Xu Qi’an, a graduate from the police academy, suddenly finds himself waking up in prison, to be exiled to the border three days later …

His initial goal was to protect himself in this world with no laws, and to be able to live a leisurely life as a rich man..

Many years later, Xu Qi’an looks back on the past, and the long-dead enemies and friends, as well as the numerous bones he has left behind.

As the Yangtze River flows eastward, the waves wash away the heroes; right and wrong, success or failure will all turn into nothing but history. However, just like the sun’s rays gleaming over the towering mountains, after the sunset, a new sun will rise.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Dungeon wo Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師さん、最強のダンジョンを創りませんか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Danjon o Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.en: Do you want to create the strongest dungeon, Mr. Alchemist who was expelled?
Exiled Alchemist, Why Not Create the Strongest Dungeon?

description.en: Rick, an alchemist who was banished from the strongest heroes' party, is wandering the wilds alone, when he saves a beautiful woman. It turns out that she is a dungeon spirit! Rick makes a contract with her and becomes the dungeon master. Now he is determined to create a dungeon that will defeat all the heroes!

title.en: Yakuza Reincarnation - Yakuza Princess of Another World -

altTitles.ru: Героизм перерождённого: Принцесса якудза в другом мире

altTitles.ja: 任侠転生 －異世界のヤクザ姫－

altTitles.zh-hk: 任俠轉生 —異世界的黑道公主—

description.en: An old school yakuza, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, ended up losing his life due to certain circumstances. But, when he awakened to a strange sort of scenery he had never seen before, he found that he had somehow changed into a beautiful girl?!
description.ru: Старый дракон, проживший долгие годы в преступном мире группировок якудза, попадает в смертельную ловушку. Однако жизнь даёт ему второй шанс. В момент смерти герой возрождается в другом мире… Но что это?! Он теперь принцесса?! Хотя внешне наш герой превратился в милую красивую девушку, в его душе все еще живет демон, взращённый среди преступного мира без морали и справедливости!..
description.pt-br: Um yakuza da velha escola, Nagamasa Ryumatsu, acabou perdendo a vida devido a certas circunstâncias. Mas, quando ele acordou para um tipo estranho de cenário que nunca tinha visto antes, ele descobriu que de alguma forma havia se transformado em uma linda garota?!

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!

A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.ja: 恋するサイコの白雪くん

description.en:
I will kill everyone for your sake.

"Hey, I think I like you!" Shirayuki says with a smile.
Haruki endures relentless bullying from a trio of classmates. One day, a beautiful transfer student named Shirayuki suddenly approaches him and asks if he would date him if the bullying stopped. Haruki dismisses it as a joke. But the next day, one of his tormentors disappears. Then another. One thing's for sure—Shirayuki is a psychopath that lacks common sense and empathy.
description.vi:
Tôi sẽ giết tất cả mọi người vì cậu.

"Này, hình như tôi thích cậu mất rồi!" Shirayuki mỉm cười nói.
Haruki đã phải chịu đựng bắt nạt không ngớt bởi bộ ba bắt nạt cầm đầu lớp. Bổng một ngày, Shirayuki, một học sinh chuyển trường xinh đẹp đột nhiên xuất hiện tiếp cận Haruki và hỏi liệu cậu sẽ hẹn hò với cậu ấy nếu việc bắt nạt chấm dứt. Haruki bác bỏ và chỉ coi đó là trò đùa cho đến ngày hôm sau, một trong số kẻ bắt nạt biến mất và lần lượt từng người một. Chỉ có một điều chắc chắn rằng - Shirayuki là một tên tâm thần thiếu nhận thức thông thường và sự đồng cảm.

description.en: Basically, this manga follows Hibino Hareluya as he tries to "conquer the world" by dealing with the everyday punks on the street. Always ready to fight and always winning his fights, he just finds himself in more and more trouble. Along the way he surrounds himself with friends who are all very strong in their own unique way.

altTitles.ja: あの子の子ども

description.en:
"I think I might be pregnant."

Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara.
One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test.
Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result...

- **Note: Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

I’m Kang Yong-ho, the Chairman of Choi Sung Group, one of South Korea’s top 10 conglomerates.
Just when I was basking in the glory of my retirement declaration, out of the blue, a new employee fell from the sky and landed on my head. But hey, where’d my body go, and now I’ve turned into a new Employee?!

“What’s this? Are you telling me to start with Excel or something?

title.en: A Village Protected by a Dragon

altTitles.en: The Village protected by a dragon

altTitles.es-la: Uma Vila Protegida Por Um Dragão

altTitles.zh: You Long Shou Hu De Xiao Zhen

description.en: Hua Dai found herself with an illness - whenever she touches something she wants/likes, her hands will get stuck to it until she buys it. Due to this illness, she is in great debt. Without choice, she decided to go back to her grandpa's house with this secret key her grandpa gave her in search of treasure, hoping to pay off her debts. As Hua Dai arrived at Bai Lin Village, she found a girl named "Long" who claimed to be a disciple of her grandpa. With this, Hua Dai started living with this strange girl…

title.en: I Asked My First Girlfriend Why She Went Out with Me

altTitles.ja: 初めて出来た彼女に何で付き合ってくれたのか訊いてみた

altTitles.ja-ro: Hajimete Dekita Kanojo ni Nande Tsukiattekureta no ka Kiitemita

altTitles.ne: मैले आफ्नो पहिलो प्रेमिकालाई सोधें "तिमीले मलाई किन डेट गर्यौ?"

altTitles.en: I asked my first girlfriend why she dated me
You Can't Do This, Your Majesty!

description.en:
The Empire’s strongest Knight, Rosetta.

She returned four times to save the assassinated prince.

In this life, she tried to hide her power and save the Crown Prince by working as a maid, not an escort knight.

“You said you wanted me,” said the feisty prince.

“I meant I wanted your safety.”

“Similar meaning.” Very, very dangerous.

“So don’t talk to me, open your mouth, Rosé.”

“Don’t do this, My Majesty!”

altTitles.ja: 佐々木と宮野

description.en: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!

One night a mysterious and unexplained phenomenon occurs in the nine provinces. Five years later Chu Feng, a regular outer disciple of the Azure Dragon school, awakens one of the mysterious nine lightning beasts. And discovers an egg sealed inside him.  
  
From there we follow Chu Feng on his path of cultivation.

altTitles.ja: ノブナガ先生の幼な妻

altTitles.zh: 信长老师有个萝莉老婆

description.en: The manga centers on the relationship between a middle school teacher who has a knack for gal games and a 14-year-old "perfect prospective wife" who is an expert on the Sengoku period.
description.ja: 「ある日突然、自分のことを大好きな女の子が現れるはず」。そんなギャルゲー展開を夢見続けてきた中学教師・信永くん。そんな彼の元に、戦国時代から14歳の姫が子作りをしにやってきた!? 彼の妻を自称する14歳の少女・帰蝶。彼女は戦国時代からやってきたらしく、信永=織田信長と勘違いし、子づくりを迫るが…!? 14歳=手を出したら一発アウト!! しかも、戦国姫も、教え子も、なんでみなオレに迫ってくるんだ!? 赤面女子のマエストロ・紺野あずれの最新作はギャルゲ脳な教師と戦国脳な姫が巻き起こす、年の差ラブコメ!!

description.en: After 40,000 years of trials and tribulations, humanity has established a vast empire spanning the galaxy. However, evil gods, insectoids, Orcs, and traitors! These enemies of humanity have inflicted innumerable wounds on this colossus. Humanity, raising the banner of survival, has seen countless loyal bones scattered across the wilderness. Yet, the enemies of humanity have now breached the barriers of time and space, aiming to strangle humanity in its cradle. The skeletal Emperor, bridging two epochs alongside a cursed child, will embark on this grand and tumultuous saga!

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon ~Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple
Reincarnated • The Hero Marries the Sage ~After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess.

They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later,

Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”

“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?

altTitles.ja: くらいあの子としたいこと

altTitles.en: What I’d like to do with that gloomy girl

altTitles.id: Apa yang inginku lakukan dengan gadis yang murung itu?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurai Ano Ko to Shitai Koto

altTitles.zh: 想与阴暗的她一起做的事

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiǎng yǔ yīn'àn de tā yīqǐ zuò de shì

description.en: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it! A school romance comedy together with that reserved, cute girl as we try to stop being loners!
description.ja:
陰のある子は美しい！
内気可愛いあの子と送る、目指せ脱ぼっち学園ラブコメ！
description.pt-br: A garota sombria é linda!  Uma romcom escolar sobre uma garota fofa e tímida e um garoto que quer fazer amigos!

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

description.fr:
Jiwoo est un jeune lycéen au bon coeur qui utilise ses réflexes incroyablement rapides pour rendre le monde meilleur, que ce soit en sauvant un petit enfant ou bien un animal de compagnie. Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Except that on the day she thought she would finally be promoted she instead get transferred to the Demon Resources Department which seems to be the subject of lots of suspicious and scary rumors…

altTitles.ja: 今日からCITY HUNTER

description.en:
A forty-year-old single woman, obsessed with City Hunter manga, is hit by a train only to find herself in the world of her favorite manga. Big fan of Ryou Saeba since her teenage years, she will do all she can to live a love story with him.

---
Official Release:
- French release by Ki-oon (2019)
- Indonesian release by Akasha (2020)
- Italian release by Panini Comics (2019)
description.id:
Kaori Aoyama adalah seorang karyawati yang masih lajang di usia 40 tahun. Sejak remaja, pria idamannya adalah Ryo Saeba. Suatu hari, Kaori tertabrak kereta yang sedang melaju, namun saat tersadar, Kaori mendapati dirinya kembali ke sosoknya di masa SMA, dan hidup di alam komik “City Hunter” yang sangat disukainya.

Tak ada seorang pun yang bisa dimintai pertolongan oleh Kaori, dan tanpa sadar kakinya melangkah menuju papan pengumuman di Shinjuku. Harapan terakhirnya hanyalah huruf-huruf “XYZ”, kode untuk menghubungi City Hunter.

Di dunia City Hunter, Kaori memulai kehidupannya yang kedua!

(Sumber: Gramedia; sinopsis resmi)

altTitles.ja: エンジェル・ハート
エンジェル・ハート 1stシーズン

description.en:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
description.ja: 台湾の黒社会組織の殺人兵器として養成された少女グラス・ハート。彼女は自殺を図るが、シティーハンターのパートナー槇村香の心臓を移植され一命をとりとめる。蘇ったグラス・ハートは組織を抜け出し、香の記憶に導かれるように新宿・リョウの元へ。やがて二人は香の心臓という絆で、再会をはたすのだが……!?
description.es-la: Una joven asesina taiwanesa con el nombre clave de "Corazón de Cristal" se suicidó saltando desde un edificio, y su corazón fue atravesado por una valla metálica. Milagrosamente, su vida se salvó gracias a un trasplante de corazón. Durante su recuperación comenzó a experimentar extraños sueños, que la llevaron a Japón en busca del donante de su corazón, que resulta ser Kaori Makimura, antigua compañera de City Hunter.

description.en:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world!  

――This is a light for life in a different world.  When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf…?!  
  
Start different world capture with different races and sub-races!  

---

- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
description.es:
Supervivencia en el otro mundo con mi maestro  
¿¡Kousuke se encontró en un mundo completamente diferente!?  
De pie allí, con el desierto al este y un bosque a su izquierda, decidió hacer un buen uso de la ocurrencia y pone a prueba su conocimiento, donde encuentra esta increíble habilidad de creación, ¡al igual que los juegos de su mundo original!
description.ja:
気が付けば、そこは異世界だった!?目の前には荒野と背後には森が広がる大地に立っていたコースケ。

培った知識から森でサバイバルをしていたところ、元の世界でプレイしていたサバイバルゲームのように道具を作れるクラフト能力を手に入れていたことに気が付いた。

——これで異世界生活にも光明が。と思っていたところ、いきなり美人ダークエルフに襲われて……!?

異種族・亜人種たちとゆく異世界攻略スタート!!

description.ru: Косукэ оказался в совершенно ином мире. Стоя там посреди дикой природы в густом лесу, он решил использовать это перемещение с умом и проверить свои знания выживания! Там он находит эту удивительную возможность крафта, точно такую же, как и в игре из его изначального мира!

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

本好きの下剋上 第三部

description.en: Following a disastrous encounter with a noble, Myne finally resolves to say goodbye to her family and friends in the lower city, changing her name to “Rozemyne” and beginning her new life as the adopted daughter of Ehrenfest’s archduke. However, her days as an archnoble in noble society are brutal, as she is put through rigorous etiquette and magic training on top of her duties as High Bishop and forewoman. It all proves too much for a weak little seven-year-old girl… Or it would have, had the High Priest not offered her the keys to the temple’s book room as a reward. If she could get her hands on those, she’d be able to read all sorts of precious books! Her name may have changed, but Rozemyne’s passion for books remains the same as she charges into a whole new world! The detailed setting expands as the printing industry grows in size. Here begins Part 3 of this biblio-fantasy for book lovers everywhere!

Archer Sword God: Descendants of the Archer

In order to obtain the "ending" that will make all their wishes come true, the songwriters decide to fight with the power of their music.

What awaits them is either hope or――。

description.en: A half-Swedish, half-Japanese girl who seems to have everything except experience with men is using a date coaching app to get used to flirting. However the guy she hits it off with actually uses the same app with a different coach!
description.id:
Renai Daikou (Love Agency) – Agen Cinta
Akasaka Aka x Nishizawa 5mm
Akasaka Aka, yang telah membuat sejarah dalam sejarah komedi romantis dengan “Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen”, kembali dengan komedi romantis baru! Tim baru ini bekerja sama dengan Nishizawa 5mm, seorang pendatang baru yang sedang menjadi topik hangat di dunia manga online! Ini adalah awal dari “komedi
description.ru:
Девушка со шведскими и японскими корнями, у которой, кажется, есть всё, кроме опыта общения противоположным полом, использует приложение для обучения свиданиям, чтобы научиться флиртовать.
Однако парень, с которым у нее завязываются отношения, использует то же приложение с другим тренером!
description.uk:
Ака Акасака, автор "Каґуя-сама хоче, щоб він зізнався їй. Війна сердець та розумів геніїв" та "Дитя улюбленця", презентує свій новий витвір!

У Марі Марії Вінтер-Нанасе, наполовину шведки, наполовину японки, є все, про що можна мріяти. Дівчина виросла в заможній родині закордоном, має багато подруг і вродливу зовнішність. Однак є в ній один недолік: вона не вміє розмовляти з хлопцями!

Узявши в бібліотеці книгу про кохання, у ній вона знайшла підозрілу рекламу. Там йшлося про Агентство Кохання, що надає профі в коханні, який упорається з вашим особистим життям за вас. Після того, як дівчина відсканувала код, з'являється агентка, на ім'я Кон, та обіцяє допомогти Марі зійтися з її коханим. Однак хлопець, що припав їй до душі, Секі Масая, не такий уже й невинний і також користується послугами агентства, щоб почати зустрічатися з нею. Як складеться доля цієї пари?
description.vi: Tác phẩm của Akasaka Aka (tác giả của Oshi no Ko và Kaguya-sama) và Nishizawa 5mm. Một cô gái mang trong mình dòng máu Thụy Điển và Nhật Bản cực kỳ ưu tú nhưng cô ấy lại không có kinh nghiệm với đàn ông. Cô ấy quyết định sử dụng một ứng dụng dịch vụ tình yêu để chinh phục chàng trai ấy. Tuy nhiên, anh chàng mà cô ấy nhắm đến cũng đang sử dụng ứng dụng đó để chinh phục cô!
description.pt-br: Uma garota meio sueca/meio japonesa que parece ter tudo, exceto experiência com homens, está usando um aplicativo de coaching para encontros para se acostumar a flertar. No entanto, o cara com quem ela se dá bem na verdade usa o mesmo aplicativo com um treinador diferente!

title.en: Yuusha-sama, Sakuya mo Otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.ja: 勇者様、昨夜もお楽しみでしたね。

altTitles.ja-ro: Yusha-sama, sakuya mo otanoshimi deshita ne.

altTitles.en: Hero-Sama, I Hope You Had Fun Last Night.
Hero Last Night Was Pumped Wasn’t It?

description.en:
"I did it again...!"

The Hero who can't seem to set out on his journey!!

The protagonist, who was reincarnated into another world, becomes a hero and receives the task of defeating the Demon King. To repay the world that accepted him , he decides to set out on a journey... However, he can't seem to leave the first village, as he is constantly tempted by charming heroines such as the female priestess, his childhood friend who is a magician, and so on!

Thus, the birth of the "I did it again...!" type hero!

On the planet Eruthyll planet, humans obtained unique crystal veins called Dubriostal, based on which they developed brilliant magic tech.

Feeling blessed by Dubriostal, people start to worship and deify Dubriostal, thus resulting in the emergence of Crystalis Conflux. Steeped in Crystalis Conflux's propaganda, people discriminate against those who cannot resonate with the Dubriostal, branding them as Castaway and claiming their souls are incomplete. Crystalis Conflux secretly devised an evil plan; only Castaways can see through their lies. To fight against the Crystalis Conflux and save the world, Castaways formed their resistance group - Gopher Troupe.

This manhua elaborates on the founding of Gopher Troupe and Castaways' glorious path of struggle.

A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

The Executioner of the Demon King's Daughter: The Otherworldly Butler Does as He Pleases

description.en:
From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!

Lute, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. That encounter turns everything upside down. Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.
